title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: The Book of Fours
description: A new evil menaces the inhabitants of Sunnydale with a quartet of disasters based on the four sacred elements--earth, air, fire, and water--as Buffy teams up with her predecessor's Watcher, sorcerer Kit Bothwell, to find the answer to her own prophetic dreams. Reprint. (A UPN television series, created by Joss Whedon, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar) (Horror)
author: Nancy Holder
